availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jesse C. Gilbert (Marshall County, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Marshall County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Son of Joel Gilbert and Charlotte Gilbert. Married to Azelia Berry Gilbert. Father of Charles Gilbert and Franklin. Clerk of the Marshall County Court in Benton, Kentucky. Elected to the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky in 1861. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russelville, Kentucky, in November 1861.
